channel.title: Man...stuff like this always happen to me
channel.description:
im trying to add my server to the serverstatus checker but this happens
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'kevv-scape.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '24.186.133.194'' at line 1
can some one plz tell me wat i have to do to fix this?
